ayahs.englishText: BEHOLD. We sent Noah unto his people. [saying:] "Warn thy people ere grievous suffering befall them!
ayahs.arabicText: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِ أَنْ أَنْذِرْ قَوْمَكَ مِنْ قَبْلِ أَنْ يَأْتِيَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ

ayahs.englishText: [And Noah] said: "O my people! I am but a plain warner to you, [sent to tell you]
ayahs.arabicText: قَالَ يَا قَوْمِ إِنِّي لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌ مُبِينٌ

ayahs.englishText: that you should worship God [alone] and be conscious of Him. "Now do pay heed unto me,
ayahs.arabicText: أَنِ اعْبُدُوا اللَّهَ وَاتَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيعُونِ

ayahs.englishText: so that He may forgive you some of your sins, and grant you respite until a term known [to Him alone]: but, behold, when the term appointed by God does come, it can never be put back - if you but knew it!"
ayahs.arabicText: يَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ مِنْ ذُنُوبِكُمْ وَيُؤَخِّرْكُمْ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ اللَّهِ إِذَا جَاءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُ ۖ لَوْ كُنْتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ

ayahs.englishText: [And after a time, Noah] said: "O my Sustainer! Verily, I have been calling unto my people night and day
ayahs.arabicText: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوْتُ قَوْمِي لَيْلًا وَنَهَارًا

ayahs.englishText: but my call has only caused them to flee farther and farther away [from Thee].
ayahs.arabicText: فَلَمْ يَزِدْهُمْ دُعَائِي إِلَّا فِرَارًا

ayahs.englishText: And behold, whenever I called unto them with a view to Thy granting them forgiveness, they put their fingers into their ears, and wrapped themselves up in their garments [of sin]; and grew obstinate, and became [yet more] arrogant in their false pride.
ayahs.arabicText: وَإِنِّي كُلَّمَا دَعَوْتُهُمْ لِتَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ جَعَلُوا أَصَابِعَهُمْ فِي آذَانِهِمْ وَاسْتَغْشَوْا ثِيَابَهُمْ وَأَصَرُّوا وَاسْتَكْبَرُوا اسْتِكْبَارًا

ayahs.englishText: "And behold I called unto them openly;
ayahs.arabicText: ثُمَّ إِنِّي دَعَوْتُهُمْ جِهَارًا

ayahs.englishText: and, behold I preached to them in public; and I spoke to them secretly, in private;
ayahs.arabicText: ثُمَّ إِنِّي أَعْلَنْتُ لَهُمْ وَأَسْرَرْتُ لَهُمْ إِسْرَارًا

ayahs.englishText: and I said: "'Ask your Sustainer to forgive you your sins - for, verily, He is all-forgiving!
ayahs.arabicText: فَقُلْتُ اسْتَغْفِرُوا رَبَّكُمْ إِنَّهُ كَانَ غَفَّارًا

ayahs.englishText: He will shower upon you heavenly blessings abundant,
ayahs.arabicText: يُرْسِلِ السَّمَاءَ عَلَيْكُمْ مِدْرَارًا

ayahs.englishText: and will aid you with worldly goods and children, and will bestow upon you gardens, and bestow upon you running waters.
ayahs.arabicText: وَيُمْدِدْكُمْ بِأَمْوَالٍ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجْعَلْ لَكُمْ جَنَّاتٍ وَيَجْعَلْ لَكُمْ أَنْهَارًا

ayahs.englishText: "'What is amiss with you that you cannot look forward to God's majesty,
ayahs.arabicText: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَرْجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارًا

ayahs.englishText: seeing that He has created [every one of] you in successive stages?
ayahs.arabicText: وَقَدْ خَلَقَكُمْ أَطْوَارًا

ayahs.englishText: "'Do you not see how God has created seven heavens in full harmony with one another,
ayahs.arabicText: أَلَمْ تَرَوْا كَيْفَ خَلَقَ اللَّهُ سَبْعَ سَمَاوَاتٍ طِبَاقًا

ayahs.englishText: and has set up within them the moon as a light [reflected] and set up the sun as a [radiant] lamp?
ayahs.arabicText: وَجَعَلَ الْقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورًا وَجَعَلَ الشَّمْسَ سِرَاجًا

ayahs.englishText: "'And God has caused you to grow out of the earth in [gradual] growth; and thereafter He will return you to it [in death]:
ayahs.arabicText: وَاللَّهُ أَنْبَتَكُمْ مِنَ الْأَرْضِ نَبَاتًا

ayahs.englishText: and [then] He will bring you forth [from It] in resurrection.
ayahs.arabicText: ثُمَّ يُعِيدُكُمْ فِيهَا وَيُخْرِجُكُمْ إِخْرَاجًا

ayahs.englishText: "'And God has made the earth a wide expanse for you,
ayahs.arabicText: وَاللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ الْأَرْضَ بِسَاطًا

ayahs.englishText: so that you might walk thereon on spacious paths.’"
ayahs.arabicText: لِتَسْلُكُوا مِنْهَا سُبُلًا فِجَاجًا

ayahs.englishText: [And] Noah continued: "O my Sustainer! Behold, they have opposed me [throughout], for they follow people whose wealth and children lead them increasingly into ruin,
ayahs.arabicText: قَالَ نُوحٌ رَبِّ إِنَّهُمْ عَصَوْنِي وَاتَّبَعُوا مَنْ لَمْ يَزِدْهُ مَالُهُ وَوَلَدُهُ إِلَّا خَسَارًا

ayahs.englishText: and who have devised a most awesome blasphemy [against Thee],
ayahs.arabicText: وَمَكَرُوا مَكْرًا كُبَّارًا

ayahs.englishText: inasmuch as they said [to their followers], 'Do not ever abandon your gods: abandon neither Wadd nor Suwa', and neither Yaghuth nor Ya’uq nor Nasr!'
ayahs.arabicText: وَقَالُوا لَا تَذَرُنَّ آلِهَتَكُمْ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدًّا وَلَا سُوَاعًا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسْرًا

ayahs.englishText: "And so they have led many a one astray: hence, ordain Thou that these evildoers stray but farther and farther away [from all that they may desire]!"
ayahs.arabicText: وَقَدْ أَضَلُّوا كَثِيرًا ۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ الظَّالِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَالًا

ayahs.englishText: And so, because of their sins, they were drowned [in the great flood], and were doomed to suffer the fire [of the hereafter]; and they found none who could succour them against God.
ayahs.arabicText: مِمَّا خَطِيئَاتِهِمْ أُغْرِقُوا فَأُدْخِلُوا نَارًا فَلَمْ يَجِدُوا لَهُمْ مِنْ دُونِ اللَّهِ أَنْصَارًا

ayahs.englishText: And Noah prayed: "O my Sustainer! Leave not on earth any of those who deny the truth:
ayahs.arabicText: وَقَالَ نُوحٌ رَبِّ لَا تَذَرْ عَلَى الْأَرْضِ مِنَ الْكَافِرِينَ دَيَّارًا

ayahs.englishText: for, behold, If Thou dost leave them, they will [always try to] lead astray those who worship Thee, and will give birth to nothing but wickedness and stubborn ingratitude.
ayahs.arabicText: إِنَّكَ إِنْ تَذَرْهُمْ يُضِلُّوا عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوا إِلَّا فَاجِرًا كَفَّارًا

ayahs.englishText: "O my Sustainer! Grant Thy forgiveness unto me and unto my parents, and unto everyone who enters my house as a believer, and unto all believing men and believing women [of later times]; and grant Thou that the doers of evil shall increasingly meet with destruction!"'
ayahs.arabicText: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيَّ وَلِمَنْ دَخَلَ بَيْتِيَ مُؤْمِنًا وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ وَلَا تَزِدِ الظَّالِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارًا
